thread.title: Ravichandran Ashwin Adds Another Feather To His Cap, Beats Kapil Dev For Most Test Wickets In A Home Season For India - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Ravichandran Ashwin Adds Another Feather To His Cap, Beats Kapil Dev For Most Test Wickets In A Home Season For India - Indiatimes.com

title: Ravichandran Ashwin Adds Another Feather To His Cap, Beats Kapil Dev For Most Test Wickets In A Home Season For India - Indiatimes.com
text:
Ravichandran Ashwin broke a record early on Day 2 in Pune against Australia. 
AFP 
By removing Mitchell Starc, the 30-year-old set a new record for most wickets in a home season for India in Tests. 
AFP 
He now has 64 scalps, having gone past Kapil's tally of 63. 
Starc fell in the fifth ball for 61 and Australia's innings ended at 260. Ashwin finished with figures of 3/63. 
AFP 
India's primary weapon with the ball is also on track to break Dennis Lillee's record of being the fastest to 300 Test wickets. He has 257 in 46 and needs 43 in 9 games. 
He currently holds the record of fastest to 250 wickets (45 games), a record he also took away from Lillee. Don't Miss
